text: Olga Valerievna Ponizova (; born March 8, 1974, Moscow) is a Russian theater and film actress. == Biography == In 1995 she graduated from the Boris Shchukin Theatre Institute (workshop Alla Kazanskaya). There was a theater actress Moon Theater and Moscow Theater of Young Spectators. Биография == Personal life == She was married to TV presenter and television director Andrey Chelyadinov.Olga Ponizova at KinoPoisk In 1995 the couple had a son Nikita (died in an accident July 3, 2015Единственный сын актрисы Ольги Понизовой разбился в ДТП на подмосковной трассеНа похоронах сына Ольга Понизова запретила всем плакать). == Filmography == *1989 — Do Not Get Along as Panteleyeva *1993 — Sin.
